00011 class CMVCalendar implements CMObject {
00012  
00017  public $items = array();
00018  
00023  public $version = "2.0";
00024  
00029  public $prodID;
00030  
00036  public function CMVCalendar($company = "Chance MEDIA", $product = "CMLIB") {
00037   $this->prodID = "-//$company//NONSGML $product//EN";
00038  }
00039  
00045  public function addItem($item) {
00046   array_push($this->items, $item);
00047   return true;
00048  }
00049  
00056  private function eventsToString($event, $indent = "  ") {
00057   $r = $indent . $event->type . " (\n";
00058    
00059   foreach($event->attr as $k => $v) {
00060    $r .= "$indent  $k";
00061    foreach($v as $k2 => $v2) {
00062     if($k2 != "VALUE")
00063      $r .= ";$k2=$v2";
00064    }
00065    $r .= " = " . $v['VALUE'] . "\n";
00066   }
00067    
00068   // children
00069   if(count($event->children) > 0)
00070    $r .= $this->eventsToString($event->children[0], "$indent  ");
00071     
00072   $r .= "$indent)\n";
00073   
00074   return $r;
00075  }
00076  
00080  public function __toString() {
00081   $r = "CMVCalendar (\n";
00082   $r .= "  VERSION = " . $this->version . "\n";
00083   $r .= "  PRODID = " . $this->prodID . "\n";
00084   
00085   foreach($this->items as $event)
00086    $r .= $this->eventsToString($event);
00087    
00088   $r .= ")\n";
00089   return $r;
00090  }
00091  
00092 }
